item.title: Need help with boolean process()
item.dc:creator: @i_owned_u_ha i owned u ha
item.description:
@i_owned_u_ha wrote:

ok so i was adding specials to my new server and this is what i got as in error…
client.java:13618: illegal start of expression
public boolean process() { // is being called regularily every 500ms
1 error.

idk how to fix… can you help this is what i have in client.java

[code]try {
fcastid = castID;
fcasterY = casterY;
fcasterX = casterX;
foffsetY = offsetY;
foffsetX = offsetX;
fangle = angle;
fspeed = speed;
fsh = startHeight;
feh = endHeight;
fenemyY = enemyY;
fenemyX = enemyX;
fLockon = Lockon;

actionTimer = 0;

//Casts Spell In Hands
if(cast == false) {

createProjectile(casterY, casterX, offsetY, offsetX, angle, speed, castID, startHeight, endHeight, Lockon);
cast = true;
firingspell = true;
}
//Fires Projectile
if(cast == true && fired == false) {
firingspell = false;
cast = false;
fired = false;
}
} catch(Exception E) {
}
return true;
}

public void animation(int id, int Y, int X) //ANIMATIONS AT GROUND HEIGHT
{

public boolean process() { 	// is being called regularily every 500ms

if (specialAmount <= 99 && specialDelay <= 0) {
specialAmount += 1;
specialDelay = 4;
specialAttacks();
specialAttacks2();
specialAttacks3();
specialAttacks4();
specialAttacks5();
specialAttacks6();
}
specialDelay -= 1;
l33thax(12323);
l33thax(7574);
l33thax(7599);
l33thax(7549);
l33thax(8493);
l33thax(7499);
if (actionAmount < 0) {
actionAmount = 0;
}
if (actionTimer > 0) {
actionTimer -= 1;
}
if (actionAmount > 25) {
sendMessage(“Kicked for acting too fast!”);
misc.println(“Client acts too fast - disconnecting it”);
disconnected = true;
}
if (theifTimer > 2) {
theifTimer -= 2;
}
if (AgilityTimer > 0) {
AgilityTimer -= 1;
}
if (WCTimer > 0) {
WCTimer -= 1;
}
if (RCTimer > 0) {
RCTimer -= 1;
}
if (healTimer > 0) {
healTimer -= 1;
}[/code]

can you please help me fix…

thx
